samples.current_output: Vehicle sale-kkup piragu: 1) Form 29, 30 fill, 2) Both buyer & seller sign, 3) NOC from financer (if loan), 4) Insurance transfer, 5) RTO submit + fee pay. Time: 30 days-kkul. Delay: Fine + legal issues. Online: parivahan.gov.in partially available.

samples.instruction: Court case ethanai varusham oodum? Fast track vazhi irukkaa?
samples.current_output: Average: Civil case 5-10 years, Criminal 3-7 years. Tips: Avoid adjournments, complete documentation, experienced lawyer. E-courts app-la case status track pannalam.

samples.instruction: Salary thara maattengaraanga, 3 months pending - enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) Written demand to employer, 2) Labour Inspector complaint, 3) Labour Court (if >Rs.15,000 dispute), 4) Civil Court recovery suit. Payment of Wages Act: Salary delay = interest + penalty. Documents: Appointment letter, salary slips, bank statements.

samples.instruction: Power of Attorney ethanai types? Edhu safe?
samples.current_output: Types: 1) General POA - all acts (risky), 2) Special POA - specific acts only (safer), 3) Durable POA - continues even if principal incapacitated. Registration: Property transactions - compulsory registration. Revocation: Written revocation + newspaper publication. Safe practice: Special POA with specific purpose + time limit. Never give blank POA!
